results.overview: Four boyhood pals perform a heroic act and are changed by the powers they gain in return. Years later, on a hunting trip in the Maine woods, they're overtaken by a vicious blizzard that harbors an ominous presence. Challenged to stop an alien force, the friends must first prevent the slaughter of innocent civilians by a military vigilante ... and then overcome a threat to the bond that unites the four of them.
results.title: Dreamcatcher

results.overview: The film centers on two estranged sisters who, along with their friends, become entrenched in a 48 hour whirlwind of violence after a traumatic experience at an underground music festival.
results.title: Dreamcatcher

results.overview: After a long day at work, Sunny decides to stop by a park and take a breather. She takes a look at her wallet and comes to understand that she is far from liquid by the looks of a dropped coin and a ripped bill. Suddenly, something drops from the sky. To her surprise, money is falling. A miracle so timely brings the highest of joys to her current being. This miracle does not last so long however as she is suddenly hit by a huge cluster of money which transports her to reality.
results.title: Dreamcatcher

results.overview: Nova gets a dreamcatcher as a present from her mom to protect her from bad dreams, but she will soon discover something sinister that hides within.
results.title: The Dreamcatcher

results.overview: Longinotto's documentary is about Brenda Myers-Powell, who fights against sexual exploitation and supports prostitutes in Chicago. Brenda knows what she is talking about: her own story, involving teenage prostitution and a life of violence and abuse, is in stark contrast to her dauntless energy and optimism.
results.title: Dreamcatcher

results.overview: A sexual discovery story of a young woman, Anne, who must first learn to love herself before loving someone else.
results.title: Dreamcatcher

results.overview: Dreamcatcher [Dystopia: Seven Spirits] is the second online concert held by Dreamcatcher. The concert was accompanied by a live band and featured all seven members of the group.
results.title: Dreamcatcher [Dystopia: Seven Spirits]

results.overview: Why is it that when you wake up you often forget what happened in your dreams? What if someone is stealing them from you while you sleep?
results.title: The Dreamcatcher

results.overview: Andy Gold has appeared in festivals and competitions all over the country, including the Boston Comedy Festival, San Diego Comedy Festival, Laugh Your Asheville Off and Comcast’s Trial by Laughter Comedy Festival. Andy’s comedy has also been featured on Hulu and Kevin Hart’s Laugh out Loud network on Sirius XM.
results.title: Andy Gold: Dreamcatcher

results.overview: Listen to the sweet vocals of Dreamcatcher serenade you in its purest form, with the soft melodies of their rearranged compositions in a way you've never heard them before.  Dreamcatcher showcases their colorful vocals and present a new version of their discography with unplugged arrangements for a new side of them.  Join them on the journey to utopia.
results.title: Dreamcatcher [Crossroads: Part 1. Utopia]

results.overview: Dystopia series concert day 2, Saturday 27th of March 2021.  Dreamcatcher performs top hits from their discography with the rock sound that only dreamcatcher can bring to life.  All the 7 members showcases their powerful vocals with a live band, and captivates you with dynamic choreography, all with the familiar backtracks of electric guitars and hard-hitting drums.  Join them as they run from dystopia and conclude the trilogy part dystopia series.
results.title: Dreamcatcher [Crossroads: Part 2. Dystopia]

results.overview: Performance and BTS of Dreamcatcher’s [Apocalypse: Save Us]
results.title: Dreamcatcher: [Apocalypse: Save Us] Showcase

results.overview: Haunted by an evil spirit that keeps him awake, a hunter discovers the secret power of dreamcatchers.
results.title: The Origin of the Dreamcatcher

results.overview: 2 Spirit Dreamcatcher Dot Com queers and indigenizes traditional dating site advertisements. Using a Butch NDN 'lavalife" lady (performed by director Thirza Cuthand), 2 Spirit Dreamcatcher Dot Com seduces the viewer into 2 Spirit "snagging and shacking up" with suggestions of nearby pipeline protests to take your date to, and helpful elders who will matchmake you and tell off disrespectful suitors. It's the culturally appropriate website all single 2 Spirit people wish existed.
results.title: 2 Spirit Dreamcatcher Dot Com

results.overview: Dreamcatcher's first online concert featuring performances from the Nightmare series and their first full-length album Dystopia: The Tree of Language.
results.title: Dreamcatcher [Into The Night & Dystopia]

results.original_title: The Girl and the Dreamcatcher: Make You Stay
results.title: The Girl and the Dreamcatcher: Make You Stay

results.overview: Sonia and Sergio travel on a lonely road at night. Lately, things between them have not been well, Sonia thought that her pregnancy would fix it but the relationship is getting worse. In the middle of an argument, they find Ángel, a lost boy on the road who seems to know them.
results.title: Dreamcatcher
